definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Ukash Abdi Liban is a Somali refugee who arrived at the camp in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 賴本是1988年來到這個營區的索馬利亞人。

sentences.english: The U. N. peacekeeping force was sent to Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國維和部隊被送往索馬利亞。

sentences.english: The poverty and violence in Somalia breeds the terror of tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 索馬利亞的貧窮和暴力孕育著明天的恐怖。
